title: Tipsy Elves Button Down Shirts for Men - Valentine’s Day, Mardi Gras and St Patrick’s Day Men’s Button Ups
description: COMFORT STRETCH FABRIC Tipsy Elves short sleeve button down shirts are crafted to be lightweight and flexible for effortless movement, with a cozy fit they are a must-have for your wardrobe.
BUTTERY SOFT Our casual button up shirts feature hyper-comfy fabric to ensure a lightweight fit and feel. Tipsy Elves' mens lucky clover shirts will have you ready for the next round at the pub.
VERSATILE MODERN FIT Our mens St Patricks Day shirts are designed with a tailored cut for a stylish, wear anywhere fit. Perfect for the office party or going out with friends.
WRINKLE RESISTANT Our St Patricks button downs are built with stay-crisp knitting that's easily washable and always game-ready. These novelty print shirts for men are great for any day out.
BREATHABLE Look great and feel even better with our mens button downs, you'll experience pillow-soft comfort and lightweight wearability to keep you cool in one of our collard shirt for men.
